items.name: encrypt_option_use_azecrypt_desc
items.content: Amaze\'s Encryption Format is also based on AES encryption; but apart from the AESCrypt format, it can be decrypted only with this device; You should also not remove Amaze File Manager from this device or change the way you lock your screen, otherwise you will have no way to recover the hidden file.
